website_summaries.verdict: A great general digital camera with a smaller size for vlogging and travel photography.
pros: Fully tiltable LCD screen flips up for self-recording
Video quality is adjustable with onboard menu settings and video effects
Integrated lens performs well in low-light shooting situations
cons: Small sensor results in a more cropped image than full-frame and APS-C DSLR cameras

website_summaries.verdict: The Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II is a pricey pocket camera with image quality that goes toe-to-toe with much larger models.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this camera
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this camera. So easy to use, very functional, great in low light. Awesome as a SLR replacement for trips where you have restricted luggage. Amazing photos and super fast speed!
customer_reviews.author: Tom L.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera
customer_reviews.text: Christmas present for my wife, as she had researched high-end compact cameras for a while and settled on the G7X Mk II. It's so easy to use. The presets are task based, and focus on real world scenarios, resulting in fantastic pictures whatever you're trying to capture. Colour reproduction and image quality are both fantastic, possibly better than the DSLR we own. Battery life seems very good, well over 100 shots since Christmas day and the battery hasn't needed charging yet!
customer_reviews.author: Nick Preston

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little camera
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my holiday at the end of the month - although it was released a couple of years ago I'm very impressed (the dog might not be)
customer_reviews.author: Karl Say

customer_reviews.title: Best camera ever!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best cameras I have ever owned! I have had it for about one year now and it still works as efficiently as when I first bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Carr

customer_reviews.title: Best quality pictures I,ve ever taken!
customer_reviews.text: Quality build (weighty and robust) and comfortable to hold. Picture quality is sensational (IMO), but what really impressed was the quality in almost darkness with no flash. Would consider myself a novice photographer, but this produces brilliant photographs straight out of the box (on auto setting). Definitely recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: T J

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: It is so called grey imprt so Canon uk won't fix it for free if it breaks but amazon confirmed that the item still has a standard product guarantee and in case of an issue they should be contacted and they would deal with it. Otherwise camera is great, small and easy to travel with! +Time lapse -manual focus
customer_reviews.author: Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Amazing camera and amazing price
customer_reviews.text: Amazing camera Fantastic for holidays and day to day use Small and compact but powerful for its size. It also takes lovely quality video. I loved it on holiday as it was small and discreet rather than carrying a large slr and the flip up screen was great for when wanting whole family photos (to make sure no one was cropped out) and the battery life is fantastic Used daily in Disneyland and only needed to charge it once over a 4 day holiday
customer_reviews.author: beth

customer_reviews.title: Great for quick photos & must have for vloggers
customer_reviews.text: I used this camera for a good few months for YouTube vlogs and videos. Very nice compact size, picture quality I have to say is one of the best you can get for this price. Battery could be a better but for the image quality it’s definitely a winner. The only downside I have to say is the audio. As with many cameras, the main focus (obviously) was on the image quality and the audio really suffers! Check out some of my videos on my YouTube channel: Persian Prince Vlogs for the video & audio quality in action
customer_reviews.author: Persian Prince Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Camera
customer_reviews.text: This Camera can record in 25, 50, 24, 30 & 60 fps. It has great picture quality. It doesn't have a jack for an external microphone but the audio on the Camera is great but it does pick up a lot of background noise. You can buy a Wind Muffler to fix that though.
customer_reviews.author: Davidoff Productions

customer_reviews.title: I'm realy happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm realy happy with this purchase. Great compact camera, good for travel with great quality of pictures and video. I also like timelapse option.
customer_reviews.author: Tomas

customer_reviews.title: Superb Camera
customer_reviews.text: Really good quality and easy to use. I have a load of cameras but this is the best I've had for most applications.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Kelevra

customer_reviews.title: I am obsessed with my new camera!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this when it was on sale to start blogging and vlogging, and I am so impressed! For a beginner, this is a really good camera!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I love the camera the resolution and the quality is superb all i can say is worth the money if you are a blogger or like photography this is the right camera for you! I love it and and I'm happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Mj Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Sorry but had to return it. Unable to rate it
customer_reviews.text: sorry, unable to rate as had to return it. An error occurred
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love this cameraaa
customer_reviews.text: my first vlogging camera and i love it its so simple, dont need add ons for it to be good quality, small enough to have in a pocket even andddddd i love the flip up screen. all in all i love this camera and it isnt super expensive
customer_reviews.author: charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Annoying auto focus noise in quiet videos
customer_reviews.text: Really good, only issue is you can hear motor noise (sounds like a hard disk) when there isn’t much background noise. Trick is to disable auto focus in these situations, or are a diff audio source, then sync them up in an editor
customer_reviews.author: g2000

customer_reviews.title: Very portable
customer_reviews.text: Would be better with an eye piece but easy to use except in bright light
customer_reviews.author: E N Richards

customer_reviews.title: great! photo transfer not efficient
customer_reviews.text: its really great, as expected however the photo transfer via WiFi doesn't seem to work
customer_reviews.author: nasima

customer_reviews.title: Alex'sLife on Youtube
customer_reviews.text: Youtube-Alex'sLife quick plug if ya wanna see the camera quality like and subscribe;) Genuinley very happy with the camera quality great for all needa. If you want to vlog get a mic to draw out windsound. With good lighting the camera is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Handy and perfect for vlogs
customer_reviews.text: One of the best digital cameras I've used. The selfie screen helps with vlogs and videos as well. Amazing quality!
customer_reviews.author: Limel

customer_reviews.title: What else do you need ?
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome camera. Straight forward, excellent quality, and easy to use. Get it, go on treat yourself, you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Adjudicator

customer_reviews.title: Really good Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for any blogger, trips or even photos, a sturdy and well built.
customer_reviews.author: wingsu

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered Saturday lunchtime with delivery due Monday, but arrived Sunday morning! Amazing thanks. Perfect condition and great price. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Mr P.

customer_reviews.title: Just love it as a camera.
customer_reviews.text: very flexible, but the auto setting is very good. Such a useful camera, I use it all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Vlogging
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera, beautiful pictures and easy to use and figure out. I use for YouTube blogging and I’m ver pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best point and shoot in this price range
customer_reviews.text: My favorite camera, I have even used it for back up footage on jobs
customer_reviews.author: John Smyth

customer_reviews.title: awesome camera, spend the money
customer_reviews.text: awesome camera, spend the money. relatively small but picture quality is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Usb area not working
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if is only me but my usb area is not working I have tried a few of usb cables so I can import my pictures and videos to my laptop but no chance
customer_reviews.author: Christine kossa

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic camera
customer_reviews.text: Lovely camera just need to get another battery as not going to last long fo our holiday.
customer_reviews.author: M2dov

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use camera, packed with all the settings you need for awesome YouTube vlogs.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Gebler

customer_reviews.title: Very good camera.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic little camera, with a million settings to set. It really enables you to do anything you want. The quality is very very good, especially the video. My only complaint is that it's very heavy, but at the same time it feels very solid and almost professional. Miles away from any other compact camera I have ever heald in my hands. Like all cameras, original batteries are a total ripoff, so I had to buy cheap remakes.
customer_reviews.author: Life Reportage

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Compact
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Compact. I have been relying on my i phone 7 to take pictures when I do not have my Canon EOS 80 with me, however have become increasingly disappointed by the results due to the limitations of controls. The G7x is a delight to use, superb results and fits perfectly with the Canon set of controls from the DSLR and great for keeping in your pocket on those occasions when you want to travel light.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. M. Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Phew I made the right choice
customer_reviews.text: Great service and order turnaround in time for my holiday. Although already a committed Cannon buyer (2 DSLRs plus lots of other gear) I looked long and hard for a high end compact. The G7 mark ii won out in the end. Great decision. Lovely to use, quality results, good flexibility. A great carry around for tourist stuff but also giving the ability for fairly serious shots when needed.
customer_reviews.author: KH7159

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera
customer_reviews.text: Only had this camera a few days but finding it easy to use. One of the many features I love is being able to send the photos to my iPhone and iPad. The photos are nice and sharp, and are nearly as good as my 7d, but this can be carried in my pocket. Make sure you get a case to protect the screen.
customer_reviews.author: K. J. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Much improved on the Mark 1
customer_reviews.text: Much improved on the Mark1 I owned for 2 years, better grip and way better for high speed shooting. Operates much faster too. However the same lens quality issue remains, I had one copy that was soft at full zoom, got a second that was perfect at full zoom but very soft in the corners at wide/mid ranges. This appears to be a regular issue with this lens, it seems to have been 'stretched' from 28-24mm and as such a sharp corner image quality can never been obtained when shooting at wide angle. Pity, as I much prefer this camera to the competing Sony RX series.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Great portable with awesome picture quality and full manual control over your image.
customer_reviews.text: Great travel camera for those who value picture quality, need excellent low light performance or who want to grow the control they have over taking pictures. While it can be used as a point and shoot to do so is to woefully under use this wonderful little camera. Goes everywhere with me now.
customer_reviews.author: Doc2k1

customer_reviews.title: Autofocus not seamless but great for vlogging
customer_reviews.text: My only niggle with this camera is the autofocus, it's a bit hit and miss at times. I'm on to my second one now as my first was stolen and it is by far the best vlogging camera in terms of ease and functionality. Not great for taking pictures with but I think it's been designed as a vlogging camera rather than stills.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant product but very sad to not be compatible with Canon Money back
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant camera, although this was purchased with the hope to get the £40 money back from Canon but it wasn’t the case. A bit gutted about it but this camera is very easy to use and very versatile. Does all and more in a very compact format. I would definitely buy another battery if you are going g to record videos. Photos are beautiful and it will make you realise that even a goof mobile phone camera can’t compete.
customer_reviews.author: Hoobsy-B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent point and shoot
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking to spend this money on a point and shoot then you would have already done your research. Very well built, easy to use and excellent video quality. Only down side is the position of the WiFi button. When holding the camera in selfie mode your fingers rest on the button and it is so easy to press.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice camera take great photos without having to take loads of lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Burchell

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Great camera however had to send it back within 4 weeks due to dirt behind the camera lense. You could clearly see the spec of dirt on videos and photos.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was perfect, got some beautiful shots
customer_reviews.text: Took this camera to Rome. Was perfect, got some beautiful shots. the adjustable LCD screen was perfect and actually very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: A premium compact
customer_reviews.text: I've had this camera for just a few days but I am very happy with it! It's perfect for amateur photography and videography. Flip out screen makes it ideal for video blogging and self portraits.
customer_reviews.author: William John Peralta Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic seller!
customer_reviews.text: This product was practically brand new. I am so impressed by the level of service offered! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Onscreen menus are re designed as is the editing software which is a good bit more sophisticated
customer_reviews.text: Bought the G7X MK11 as a replacement for my lost Mk1. This camera may look similar to the MK1. However it`s radically different with only the MK1 lens as any comparison. Onscreen menus are re designed as is the editing software which is a good bit more sophisticated. Image quality is improved. Most notably in low light. Still has 1080p camera. If this is not a big thing for you, then you can save a good bit of money by going for this Canon instead of the Sony RX100 Mk4. There is little difference in the specs between these two cameras on the shooting side. Overall i`m happy and hopefully i won`t lose this one so soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Canon Camera says busy & won’t take pictures
customer_reviews.text: Very nice portable camera for my daily blogs with the DSLR features and compact screen all in 1 - very good only downside is that I have been experiencing is that camera says ‘Busy’ and doesn’t take the pictures sometimes. but next day is fine. Still no matter how much I press the shutter button and take photos when it “does work” still says busy. Tried to contact the Canon in UK/Ireland and they never got back to me. Still have the warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Mila (LittleCutie ABDL)

customer_reviews.title: Charged battery and switched on..... ...
customer_reviews.text: Charged battery and switched on..... or not! Completely dead. battery fully charged but no function. Gone back for replacement. Gutted!
customer_reviews.author: Dr DK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect camera
customer_reviews.text: Perfect camera for take some photos and for record some videos for YouTube like a vlogs. Easy to use and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: LIVEAdrian

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera! So easy to use for a camera novice!
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

product_meta.title: Canon Powershot G7 X Mark II Digital Camera Camera - Vlogging Camera, with Full HD 60p movies and tilt touch screen, ideal for vloggers and YouTube content creators
product_meta.description:
Style Name:Camera OnlyWith a 1.0 type sensor, bright f/1.8-2.8 canon lens and superior DIGIC 7 processing this pocket-sized, large sensor compact offers DSLR-like creativity in both stills and full HD movies. Battery life: approximate 240 shots.

BOX CONTAINS
Digital Camera PowerShotG7 X Mark II Wrist Strap WS-DC12 Battery Pack NB-13L Battery Charger CB-2LHE AC Cable User Manual Kit
feature_bullets: A camera with a bright lens, sensor and DIGIC 7 to capture quality photos, movies. FL - 4.2 x zoom: 8.8 (W) - 36.8 (T) mm, 35 mm film equivalent: 24 (W) - 100 (T) mm
Shoot and share stunning full HD 60 p movies with creative control, touch AF for cinematic focus pulls and 5-axis dynamic IS
Easily connect to your smart device, shoot remotely, then share or back up your creations using Wi-Fi with NFC and Image sync
Enjoy simple creative control with a lens control ring, intuitive touchscreen operation, 14-bit raw and picture styles
Powershot G7 X mark II battery pack NB-13L battery charger CB-2LHEAC wrist strap NS-DC12 AC cable user manual kit
3 Inch type touchscreen and tilt-type LCD monitor 180 degree upwards, 45 downwards

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars134 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
